summary: A scheming wife lures an insurance investigator into helping murder her husband and then declare it an accident. The investigator's boss, not knowing his man is involved in it, suspects murder and sets out to prove it.
cast: Richard Crenna|Lee J. Cobb|Robert Webber|Samantha Eggar|Arch Johnson|Kathleen Cody|John Fiedler|John Elerick|Joan Pringle|Gene Dynarski|Ken Renard|Joyce Cunning|Arnold F. Turner|Rand Brooks|Tom Curtis|John Furlong
keywords: french kiss|kissing a married woman|murder plot|using sex appeal as motivator|late night
title: Double Indemnity
